# Part 1: [Storytelling](storytelling.qmd)

In this section, we will discuss strategies for communicating research to others following good story telling principles. This will include:

1. Telling a story
2. Designing slides
3. Giving a talk

# Part 2: [Visualizing Information](visualizing-information.qmd)

In this section, we will discuss design principles for visualizing information through charts. This will include:

1. The visual-memory system and the psychology of data visualization
2. Data visualization "Don'ts"
3. Data visualization "Do's"
